author: James H
content: A total sensory explosion! I loved how the tour wasn't just about eating, but about the history of Hanoi. Going from the noisy market to the quiet French shop felt like time travel. The sweet Banh Mi was a surprise highlight. Highly recommend arriving hungry because you WILL be full!
